title: Senior or Junior?
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Were you really a college student in America, Mia-chan!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Pretty much. I skipped a few grades, so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>That’s amazing, even though you’re so small~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Don’t call me small! My body size doesn’t have anything to do with it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Sorry! You’re right, but I have a little sister, so I can’t help but worry about people smaller than me.... Though I guess I don’t need to since you’re so reliable, huh, Mia-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>S-, so you do get it.... I also took it too seriously. Sorry.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>With that said! Since you’re my senior in high school, please teach me how to read these long English reading comprehension problems~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Wait. You should do that kind of stuff yourself.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eeeeh~! But you’re my senior, Mia-chan! You have to help your junior out~~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I-, if you’re my junior, then you should listen to your senior~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
